book-scanner.title: Alexandria (React Native)
book-scanner.description: App for scanning and managing books, with a mini inventory control. Developed with React Native, Expo Go and Supabase, and integrated with the Google Books API to enrich the data of the registered books. See more details on GitHub.

tattoo-shop.title: Tattoo Shop Project - Website with Next.js
tattoo-shop.description: Commercial page for a hypothetical tattoo artist named Sandro Luz. A Next.js project.

about.title: About
about.name: My name is Rom√°rio!
about.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer with experience in React, Node.js, PHP and MySQL. I have expertise in developing dynamic interfaces and integrating APIs, working in agile environments like startups. My goal is to build a solid career, living from programming and delivering amazing products.

callToAction.title: Let's build something together?
callToAction.description: If you have a project in mind, feel free to send me a message.
